reuters.title: NAT'L SAVINGS BANK <NSBA> HIRES NEW PRESIDENT
reuters.body: National Savings Bank of Albany said Thomas P. Bilbao will join the company as President and Chief Executive officer next month. He was fomerly a Senior Vice President for <Goldome FSB>. National Savings said Bilbao succeeds George O. Pfaff, who was elected chairman of the board and continues as chief executive officer. Reuter 
